Did you have the game saved on Facebook or a King account? If so, simply reconnect to your account and you'll be back on your level. If the game wasn't saved anywhere, please connect it to Facebook or create a King account now, then email to Player Support from the Help Center under the game's Settings so they can move you back to level 1632.
You should still be able to connect to Facebook on the game's start menu.Head over to Community if you need any further help with this:https://community.king.com/en/candy-crush-soda-saga
